content: knit this stunning statement scarf using a warm wool blend yarn in your favorite shade this chic and stylish scarf will be a staple in your winter wardrobe with the cozy pockets and luxurious fringe you will need 700 g/436 yds of super bulky level 6 yarn to knit the arbor scarf i used 5 skeins of wool-ease thick & quick by lion brand yarn in the colorway flax the free pattern can be found *** here 1 *** the crochet version called the willow scarf can be found ** here 2 ** please note that the printable pdf for purchase is a total of 4 pages including the cover page pdf is in english only 1 https //www allaboutami com/the-arbor-scarf/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/the-willow-scarf/
